summary.para: Specifies whether the topology loader will insert hardware-based Media Foundation transforms (MFTs) into the topology.

remarks.para: This enumeration is used with the MF_TOPOLOGY_HARDWARE_MODE topology attribute.

summary.para: Use only software MFTs. Do not use hardware-based MFTs. This mode is the default, for backward compatibility with existing applications.
Use hardware-based MFTs when possible, and software MFTs otherwise. This mode is the recommended one.
If hardware-based MFTs are available, the topoloader will insert them. If not, the connection will fail.
